0.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| dedup {task.id,vcs.change.url.full},sort: {ext.task.action.made_at desc}
| filter not in(event.status,array("merged","closed")) 
| summarize count()
0.title: Open PRs

1.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| dedup {task.id,vcs.change.url.full},sort: {ext.task.action.made_at desc}
| filter not in(event.status,array("merged","closed")) 
| fieldsAdd OpenedPrDuration = toTimestamp(now()) - toTimestamp(start_time) 
| summarize max(OpenedPrDuration)
1.title: Oldest Open PR

10.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| sort ext.task.action.made_at desc
| summarize { statuses = collectArray(event.status), actions = collectArray(ext.task.action) },  by: { task.id,vcs.change.url.full  } 
| filter not in(statuses[0],array("merged", "closed")) 
| filter contains(toString(actions),"reopen")
| summarize count()
10.title: Re-opened PRs

11.content:
### GitLab Merge Request Pulse: Open & Merged Insights
This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of the status of merge requests (MRs) in your GitLab repositories. Track open and merged MRs in real-time, analyze trends, and gain insights into your team's development workflow. [Data ingest](https://dt-rnd.atlassian.net/wiki/x/WwLNLg)

12.content:
### Merged Merge Requests

This section provides a clear and detailed view of the merged merge requests, helping you to understand the efficiency and effectiveness of your code integration process.

-----

13.content:
### Open Merge Requests

This section provides a clear and detailed view of the current state of open merge requests, enabling you to manage and prioritize them effectively. 

-----

15.content:
#### Share feedback 
We welcome your feedback on this dashboard to help us improve and deliver a more effective observability solution, ensuring it provides maximum value to your software development lifecycle and delivery processes. Please post a comment here: [Feedback channel for CI/CD Pipeline Observability](https://community.dynatrace.com/t5/Platform-Engineering/Feedback-channel-for-CI-CD-Pipeline-Observability/m-p/269193/highlight/true#M1) (Dynatrace Community).
#
---

#### Additional resources
**Pipeline Observability**
* [Observability throughout the software development lifecycle increases delivery performance](https://www.dynatrace.com/news/blog/observability-throughout-the-software-development-lifecycle/) (Blog Post)
* [Concepts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/pipeline-observability-concepts) (Docs)

**Software Development Lifecycle Events**
* [Ingest SDLC events](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/sdlc-events) (Docs)
* [SDLC event specification]() (Docs)
#
---

#### About this dashboard

Preview Release v0.3.1, [Origin](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples)

2.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| dedup {task.id,vcs.change.url.full},sort: {ext.task.action.made_at desc}
| filter not in(event.status,array("merged","closed")) 
| fields 
In_open_status = toTimestamp(now()) - toTimestamp(start_time),
PR = vcs.change.id, 
Title = vcs.change.title,
URL = vcs.change.url.full,
HeadName = vcs.ref.head.name, 
HeadRevision = vcs.ref.head.revision, 
BaseName = vcs.ref.base.name, 
CreatedAt = start_time,
Repository = vcs.repository.url.full
| sort In_open_status desc
2.title: Open PRs Details

20.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| dedup {task.id,vcs.change.url.full},sort: {ext.task.action.made_at desc}
| filter not in(event.status,array("merged","closed")) 
| fieldsAdd OpenedPrDuration = toTimestamp(now()) - toTimestamp(start_time) 
| summarize avg(OpenedPrDuration)
20.title: Average Time Open

3.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.status == "merged" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter ext.task.action == "merge"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| summarize count()
3.title: Merged PRs

4.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.status == "merged" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter ext.task.action == "merge"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| summarize percentile(duration, 50)
4.title: Merge Time (p50)

5.description: Shows the average time taken to merge pull requests, providing insights into the efficiency of the review and merge process.
5.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.status == "merged" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter ext.task.action == "merge"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)

| summarize avg(duration)
5.title: Average Merge Time

6.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task"  
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.status == "merged" 
| filter event.provider =="gitlab" 
| filter ext.task.action == "merge"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| fields 
MergedAt = end_time,
Duration = duration, 
PR = vcs.change.id, 
Title = vcs.change.title,
URL = vcs.change.url.full,
HeadName = vcs.ref.head.name, 
HeadRevision = vcs.ref.head.revision, 
BaseName = vcs.ref.base.name, 
CreatedAt = start_time,
Repository = vcs.repository.url.full
| sort Duration desc
6.title: Merged PRs Details

singleValue.label: Median duration ( from open to merge )

7.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| dedup {task.id,vcs.change.url.full},sort: {ext.task.action.made_at desc}
| filter not in(event.status,array("merged","closed")) 
| summarize count(), by:{vcs.ref.base.name}
7.title: Open PRs by Branch

8.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.status == "merged" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter ext.task.action == "merge"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(vcs.ref.base.name, $Branch)
| summarize count = count(), by:{vcs.repository.name}
8.title: Merged PRs by Repository

variables.input:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| summarize distinctRepositories = collectDistinct(vcs.repository.url.full)
| expand distinctRepositories
| sort distinctRepositories

fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "change" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| summarize distinctBase = collectDistinct(vcs.ref.base.name)
| expand distinctBase
| sort distinctBase
